id.description: The unique identifier for the workflow run

applicant_id.description: The unique identifier for the applicant

workflow_id.description: The unique identifier for the workflow

workflow_version_id.description: The unique identifier for the workflow version

status.description: The status of the workflow run.

dashboard_url.description: The URL for viewing the workflow run results on your Onfido Dashboard

output.description: Output object contains all of the properties configured on the workflow version

reasons.description: The reasons the workflow run outcome was reached

error.description: Error object, only set when the workflow run status is error

created_at.description: The date and time when the workflow run was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the workflow run was last updated

tags.description: Array of tags being assigned to this check.
